# PadChainFunction delegate

```csharp
public delegate FlowReturn PadChainFunction(IntPtr pad, IntPtr parent, IntPtr buffer);
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| pad | Transfer ownership: none |
| parent | Transfer ownership: none; Nullable: true |
| buffer | Transfer ownership: full |

## Return Value

Transfer ownership: none
